name: red coreopsis cylinder vase
description:
9" x 3.5"(at the top) cylinder shaped vase. Hand painted in a deep red and a cool ivory. A hand etched drawing of a California native, coreopsis flower on one side and a graphic radiating circles on the other.

The perfect vase for flowers and stands alone as a piece of art when not in use. All of my vases are glazed on the inside, are water tight and will not sweat.

Please hand wash and dry.

name: red carniverous flower pin vase
description:
13.5" x 3.5" stoneware vase in complimenting tones of deep red and cool ice blue. A hand etched carniverous flower on one side on one side and a graphic markings on the other. Two vases in one!

It has been left unglazed on the outside to enhance the gorgeous suede quality of the painted fired surface and is glazed on the inside with a water tight glaze. It can hold your favorite flowers if you so please or it can stand alone as Art as well.

All of my pieces are one of kind.
Please hand wash only.

name: ivory feather tumbler
description:
4.5" (high) x 3.75" (wide at mouth) x (2.25" wide at bottom)

Painted ivory with a turquoise interior, hand etched with an illustrated feather from my feather collection along with my signature graphic markings. 

These are one of a kind tumblers cast from my own original form in a durable white stoneware clay. Each tumbler is hand painted in two colors (one on the outside and a different color on the inside) and etched with my original drawings and graphic markings. I make each, one by one, taking special attention and care drawing on all sides the tumbler including the bottom. The person who sits across from you while you sip will appreciate the attention I've given to the bottom of these tumblers.

Another special feature of this tumbler is that I designed them to fit into a standard car cup holder. So you can take your beautiful tumbler with you to your favorite cafe and make everyone envious as they drink from boring mass produced cups.

They hold 13.5 ounces of liquid and are finished off with a very durable clear glaze (all lead free of course) that can withstand dishwashers, microwaves and countless cups of your favorite beverages.

These tumblers are both strong and beautiful. Just the way we like them!

name: small pale blue bowl
description:
6"x6"x4" Stoneware bowl.

Hand painted a watery ice blue on the outside and a golden ochre yellow on the inside. Etched with a scabiosa flower, honey comb pattern and my signature graphic markings.

These beauties are cast from my original mold and lovingly etched with my signature motifs. Flowers, graphic squares, circles, diamonds, rain drops...Each one holds a surprise no matter which way you turn it. And don't for get to check out the bottoms for an extra bit of delight.

They fit perfectly in your hands. Not to big and not too small. Perfect for soup or a bowl of cereal. They are durable and can go in the dishwasher and microwave but I have to admit I love to hand wash my treasured bowls because it gives me that much more time to enjoy them and they will last longer if you treat them with tender loving care.

All my materials are lead free and food safe so go ahead and fill them up with your favorite delights!

name: strand of 5 glowbowls
description:
Strand of five white glowbowls strung on metal wire.
Total length is 3'6" (the first bowl hangs 18" from the top of the wire).
They are glazed on the inside so the wax will not leach through to the surface.
The outside of the *glowbowls* are left unglazed.

I designed and created my first strand of *glowbowls* in 1999. In the early days they were all made by hand, pinched into shape and then strung on to wire. Things have changed a little since then and now my *glowbowls* are slip cast with a white clay from molds that are made from original hand pinched shapes. They come in strands of five, seven and nine.

They stand alone by day as a hanging sculpture. The wire is so thin that they appear to float. At night put votive candles in them and watch them glow.

*Please note* I recommend using tea lite candles that come in the small metal cups as they do not smoke and it makes for easy removal of the candles. A set of candles will be included with your order so that you will know exactly which kind I am suggesting.

The *glowbowls* are not intended to hold any extra weight such as water or other objects as the wire is thin and though it is strong I can not guarantee them to hold up if you add extra weight to them.

They can be used either indoors or outdoors.
